azurerm_private_dns_zone_virtual_network.description: Manages a Private DNS Zone Virtual Network Link.

name.description: The name of the Private DNS Zone Virtual Network Link. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

private_dns_zone_name.description: The name of the Private DNS zone (without a terminating dot). Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: Specifies the resource group where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

virtual_network_id.description: The Resource ID of the Virtual Network that should be linked to the DNS Zone. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

registration_enabled.description: Is auto-registration of virtual machine records in the virtual network in the Private DNS zone enabled? Defaults to `false`.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The Resource ID of the Private DNS Zone Virtual Network Link.

create.description: Used when creating the Private DNS Zone Virtual Network Link.

update.description: Used when updating the Private DNS Zone Virtual Network Link.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Private DNS Zone Virtual Network Link.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Private DNS Zone Virtual Network Link.
